Gearlink Kawasaki News

Difficult Weekend at Cadwell Park
30 August 2022

Following successive double podiums it was tough weekend for the team at Cadwell Park.

Race one saw Luke Stableford finishing in 5th place in the Supersport class with Scott Swann unfortunately crashing out.

It was a disappointing double DNF in the feature race. Scott making an early exit after clipping the grass and sliding off in Turn 3. A mechanical issue ended Luke's race early forcing a retirement before the end of the race.
